testcase.classname: Partner Organization creation by PM and Approval by BAM and CA
testcase.name: Partner Organization creation by PM and Approval by BAM and CA:[OrderApproval]
testcase.system-out: Given I launch the application as a Partner Manager[UserInformation]........passed When I go to Organization Page..............................................passed Then I onboard an Organization..............................................passed Then I logout from the application..........................................passed Then I launch the application as a BAM......................................passed And I approve the organization..............................................passed Then I logout from the application..........................................passed Then I launch the application as a CA.......................................passed And I approve the organization as CA........................................passed Then I logout from the application..........................................passed Given I launch the application as a Partner Manager.........................passed And I verify that the organization is approved..............................passed Then I logout from the application..........................................passed
